Reviews.Title: Great for a Student.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife who was tired of using a tablet with a bluetooth keyboard. It's fast, light, and the touch screen is actually really nice. The price, size, weight, and specs makes this pretty much prefect for a college student.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Celeron N2815 1.86GHz (with Burst up to 2.13GHz)
11.6" HD Touchscreen
4GB Memory, 500GB Hard Drive
Webcam, Built-in 10/100/1000 Mbps Fast Ethernet LAN, Wireless-N
Black, Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Asus X200MA - 11.6-inch Touchscreen Laptop, Intel Celeron N2815 Processor 1.86 GHz, 4GB Memory, 500 GB HDD, Wireless, HDMI, Webcam, Windows 8
